definition: to leave home (to live somewhere else)
surname Li
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Is there anything I can do to improve the situation rather than leave?
sentences.chinese: 除了離家出走，我還可以做些什麼來改變現狀嗎？

sentences.english: Originally wanted to dissolve the heart of small read slowly, and, behold, the little read away from home.
sentences.chinese: 原本想化解小念心裏的心結，不料，小念離家出走。

sentences.english: Heathcliff overhears and runs away from Wuthering Heights. Ch 9
sentences.chinese: 希斯克裏夫無意間聽到，於是從呼嘯山莊離家出走。

sentences.english: Should couples be forced to divorce when their children leave home?
sentences.chinese: 孩子離家出走了，夫婦就該被迫離婚啦？

sentences.english: Then he upped and ran away from home.
Then he ran off and soon came to a great marsh where the wild ducks lived.
sentences.chinese: 於是他離家出走，不久就來到一片野鴨住的廣闊沼澤。

sentences.english: The man bunked off and left his wife with three children.
sentences.chinese: 那個男人已離家出走，丟下妻予和三個孩子。

sentences.english: It was one of my ex-girlfriends who ran away from home because of me.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一個前女友爲了我而離家出走。

sentences.english: One night that autumn, he fled his house during a raging storm.
sentences.chinese: 那年秋天一個暴風雨的夜晚，他離家出走。

sentences.english: Now he had disappeared and Fred thought Marty had run away from home.
sentences.chinese: 現在他不見了，佛瑞德認爲他離家出走了。

sentences.english: Your decision to leave the house is a double-edged sword.
sentences.chinese: 你決定離家出走，這一招兒既害人又害己。

sentences.english: Fai son again for the cute and the sea uncle had a fight, and away from home.
sentences.chinese: 輝仔再次爲了可愛一事與海叔發生爭吵，並離家出走。

sentences.english: Jack bunked off and left his wife with two children.
sentences.chinese: 傑克已離家出走，丟下妻子和兩個孩子。

definition: cannot figure out/to be unable to take a lighter view/to take things too hard/to be depressed/to fret over trifles
to close a door/to lock a door/(of a shop etc) to close (for the night, or permanently)
to lament/to complain tearfully/to wail accusingly
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
to expel (a member of an organization)/to fire (an employee)
noisy/raucous/to shout and scream
to go mad/to go crazy/to lose one's mind
to be missing/to disappear/unaccounted for
son
neighbor/next door/CL:個|个[ge4]
to suspend schooling/to defer study
almost/nearly
to charge/to demand payment
to cause havoc/to run amok
to drive out/to turn back
